name: GParted
description: GParted is a very powerful partition tool under Linux. It can create and delete partitions, also can adjust the partition size and move the partition location.

en_US.description: GParted is a very powerful partition tool under Linux. It can create and delete partitions, also can adjust the partition size and move the partition location.
en_US.name: GParted

zh_CN.description: GParted是一款Linux下的功能非常强大的分区工具，GParted可以创建、删除分区，也可以调整分区的大小和移动分区的位置。
zh_CN.name: GParted
